headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, Deprecation, Sunset
headers.vary: Accept, Authorization, Cookie, X-GitHub-OTP, Accept-Encoding, Accept, X-Requested-With
headers.x-github-media-type: github.squirrel-girl-preview; format=json, github.inertia-preview; format=json, github.starfox-preview; format=json, github.mockingbird-preview; param=sailor-v-preview; format=json
headers.x-oauth-scopes: admin:enterprise, admin:gpg_key, admin:org, admin:org_hook, admin:public_key, admin:repo_hook, gist, repo, user, workflow, write:discussion, write:packages

data.title: Code to Azure Cloud with CI/CD
data.body:
**Azure Portal - Deployment Center**
- [ ] Azure Portal - Deployment Center AKS - ARC #131
- [ ] Design - Azure Portal Deployment Center AKS - ARC #253 
- [ ] Azure Portal - Deployment Center AKS #20 
- [x] Design - Azure Portal deployment Center AKS #273 
- [x] Azure Portal - Deployment Center WebApp Containers #94
- [ ] Azure Portal - Deployment Center App Service - Windows/Linux #95
```
- [ ] Azure Portal - Deployment Center Functions App #96
- [ ] Support adding deployment Strategies and other grow up scenarios in Az AKS portal #121

```
**Azure Virtual Machines and VMSS**
- [ ] Deployment strategies for Azure Virtual Machines #294
- [ ] Azure Portal - Deployment Center Virtual Machine #91
- [ ] Azure Portal - Deployment Center VMSS #520

**Azure Portal - Create Experience**
- [ ] Azure Portal - Create Experience Static WebApp #223 
- [ ] Azure Portal - Create Experience App Service #519

**GitHub**
- [ ] GitHub Starter for Azure (Experiment) #457
- [ ] Organisation templates for Azure (experiment) #460
- [ ] GitHub - Deploy to Azure #32 
`- [ ] GHWorkspace for Jupyter notebook - InContext editing & Execution of Notebooks #43`

**Azure Portal - DevOps starter**
- [ ] Enable DevOps Starter for Web App (Windows and Linux) #45 
- [ ] Enable DevOps Starter for Kubernetes and Functions using GH Actions #46
- [ ] Enable DevOps Starter for Web App for Containers #173
- [ ] DevOps Starter - Make GitHubActions the default #523
- [x] Design - DevOps starter project #255
```
- [ ] Enable DevOps Starter for VMs and Database (SQL) #47 
- [ ] Enable DevOps Starter for Service Fabric and Database (Cosmos DB) #48 
- [ ] Enable DevOps Starter for IoT #522
- [ ] Enable DevOPs Starter for ML Applications #143
```

**VS Code**
- [x] VS Code - Deploy to Azure - NodeJS to App Service - Windows/Linux  #29
- [x] VSCode - Deploy to Azure - Local folder support for GH Pipelines #104
- [ ] VSCode - Deploy to Azure - Integrate with other Azure resource extensions GH Pipelines #105 
- [x] VSCode - Deploy to Azure - Assisted YML editing #106
- [ ] VS Code - Deploy to Azure to AKS #100

**VS IDE**
- [ ] VS IDE - Deploy to Azure - .Net to App Service - Windows/Linux  #31
- [ ] VS IDE - Deploy to Azure - assisted YML editing #112
- [x] Design - VS IDE and GitHub actions - CI CD with git initialise and push #69 
```
- [ ] VS IDE - Deploy to Azure to AKS #115
- [ ] VS IDE - Deploy to Azure to Functions App #117
- [ ] VS IDE - Deploy to Azure to WebApp Containers #116
```

**az cli**
- [x] az cli - Deploy to Azure  to AKS #30
- [x] az cli - Deploy to Azure  to ACI #107
```
- [ ] az cli - Deploy to Azure  to WebApp Containers #108
- [ ] az cli - Deploy to Azure  to App Service - Windows/Linux #109
```

**Extensibility of integrations with AzPortal, VSIDE, VSCode** 
- [ ] Improve repo analysis for better success rate of AzPortal, VSCode & VSIDE #280 
- [ ] Add Python language Support to repo analysis service #503
- [ ] Add Java language Support to repo analysis service #521

**Azure Portal traceability**
- [ ] Correlating Code and Az resource information #120 
- [ ] Design - Azure portal deployment stack and traceability experience #260

**Below cut line** - [link](https://github.com/github/ms-ecosystem/issues/140)
